summary: A comprehensive test suite for the DeepFloyd IF family of diffusion pipelines, covering text‑to‑image, image‑to‑image, super‑resolution, and inpainting variants. The tests include fast unit checks and slower integration validations that assess pipeline setup, device and precision handling, attention optimizations, memory cleanup, batch consistency, model serialization, and output quality against reference metrics.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, performance, and robustness of DeepFloyd IF inference pipelines across various generation tasks, enabling reliable deployment and continuous integration for image generation services.
